creditline: Gift of funds from J. Jerome Hill
provenance: [Durand-Ruel, Paris, until 1891; sold February 28, for $6,000, to Hill]; James J. Hill, St. Paul (from 1891-d.1916); his daughter, Charlotte Hill Slade, St. Paul (1916-d.1923); her grandson, G. Richard Slade, Mound, Minnesota (until 1967; sold to MIA)
title: Seated Female Figure Seen from Behind
